attributes.action: Make MPs pay back their tuition fees
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned would like all the MPs who voted for the increase in tuition fees despite having benefited from far more heavily subsidized higher education themselves to pay back a token sum of £7000 towards their education. We believe that this is fair as they have received at a hugely discounted price compared to what they have voted for the next generation of university students to pay.
